span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 忠诚的： loyal to a belief, organization, or group, and willing to work hard for it
【例】remain committed to one's youthful ideal
【近】loyal, faithful, allegiant[ə'lidʒənt]
【反】disloyal 不忠诚的
【派】noncommittal adj. 不明确的：giving no clear indication of attitude or feeling
【例】a noncommittal reply 一个不明确的回答
【反】confirmable 确定的
【记】 commit 委任；com + mit 送,放出→一起送出→委任
